android-cloexec-accept.description:
Description

The usage of
accept()
is not recommended, itâ€™s better to use
accept4()
.
Without this flag, an opened sensitive file descriptor would remain open across
a fork+exec to a lower-privileged SELinux domain.

Examples:

accept
(
sockfd
,
addr
,
addrlen
);
// becomes
accept4
(
sockfd
,
addr
,
addrlen
,
SOCK_CLOEXEC
);
